p: The focus of this letter is initially placed on the data that is available for China and South Korea because at the time of writing this letter these countries have apparently reached the end of the first period of their epidemic. The data from these countries together with a few others, such as Iran, Turkey, Italy, Spain, France, the USA, Russia, Germany, the UK and Brazil are considered to develop common trend parameters using a simple physical model. The developed models in this work may be used for prediction purposes by other countries or with respect to future respiratory viral infections.
